1   /**
2    * AOP-based solution for declarative caching demarcation using JSR-107 annotations.
3    *
4    * <p>Strongly based on the infrastructure in org.springframework.cache.interceptor
5    * that deals with Spring's caching annotations.
6    *
7    * <p>Builds on the AOP infrastructure in org.springframework.aop.framework.
8    * Any POJO can be cache-advised with Spring.
9    */
10  package org.springframework.cache.jcache.interceptor;
